医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
交互式仪表板提高手部卫生合规性手部卫生是预防医疗保健中感染传播的最简单、最有效的方法，但医护人员的依从性往往较低。两个卫生系统的感染预防专家将于 6 月 26 日至 28 日在佛罗里达州奥兰多举行的感染控制和流行病学专业人员协会 (APIC) 年会上展示他们成功的手部卫生干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Interactive-dashboards-improve-hand-hygiene-compliance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Interactive-dashboards-improve-hand-hygiene-compliance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea90b2bb-fe91-49d1-895a-b4c99045a831 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 02:18:05 -0400 Interactive dashboards improve hand hygiene compliance
敦促医院采取新的 MRSA 预防策略由五个医疗组织组成的小组发布了预防耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌（MRSA）传播和感染的最新建议。在美国，MRSA 引起大约 10% 的医院相关感染，此类感染与死亡风险增加相关。 MRSA 引起的某些感染在前几年下降后，在大流行期间增加了 41%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Hospitals-urged-to-adopt-new-MRSA-prevention-strategies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Hospitals-urged-to-adopt-new-MRSA-prevention-strategies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae319d2a-bf93-455e-8a08-09fa340020b3 Tue, 27 Jun 2023 01:40:07 -0400 Hospitals urged to adopt new MRSA prevention strategies
新颖的计算工具有助于分析复杂的遗传区域GeneDx（纳斯达克股票代码：WGS）是通过基因组和临床见解改善健康结果的领导者，今天在《自然方法》上发表了一篇论文，题为“泛基因组的多尺度分析能够改善重复和临床相关基因的基因组多样性的代表性”，其中研究人员开发了一种新的计算工具，即泛基因组研究工具套件（PGR-TK），用于对以前过于复杂而无法分析的临床相关基因进行可扩展分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-Computational-tool-helps-analyze-complex-genic-regions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230627/Novel-Computational-tool-helps-analyze-complex-genic-regions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b9cb872-2d8a-41a0-8617-c7f1df3f260c Tue, 27 Jun 2023 01:33:06 -0400 Novel Computational tool helps analyze complex genetic regions
添加风险增强因素可改善中国成人 10 年 ASCVD 风险分层宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。本研究旨在探讨将风险增强因素纳入中国心脏病学会推荐的动脉粥样硬化性心血管疾病（ASCVD）临床风险评估工具（即CSC模型）中是否可以改善中国成人10年ASCVD风险分层。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Adding-risk-enhancing-factors-improves-10-year-ASCVD-risk-stratification-in-Chinese-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Adding-risk-enhancing-factors-improves-10-year-ASCVD-risk-stratification-in-Chinese-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f11dc1c3-877d-4163-b38d-d4c3f1013dc5 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 23:02:00 -0400 Adding risk-enhancing factors improves 10-year ASCVD risk stratification in Chinese adults
mRNA 狂犬病疫苗在猕猴中诱导持久的免疫反应新型狂犬病 mRNA 疫苗显示出增强的免疫反应、更高的抗体水平和改善的交叉中和作用，表明针对相关狂犬病病毒株的广泛保护性疫苗的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/mRNA-rabies-vaccine-induces-durable-immune-response-in-macaques.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/mRNA-rabies-vaccine-induces-durable-immune-response-in-macaques.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=366bd483-d704-4781-b0d9-bfe15a8f472f Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:57:00 -0400 mRNA rabies vaccine induces durable immune response in macaques
ACEI 治疗可降低急性心肌梗死后心脏破裂的发生率宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。 ACEI 治疗可降低急性 MI 患者的死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/ACEI-therapy-decreases-the-incidence-of-cardiac-rupture-after-acute-myocardial-infarction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/ACEI-therapy-decreases-the-incidence-of-cardiac-rupture-after-acute-myocardial-infarction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7767092a-2783-4eba-a1f8-5b2fab4900db Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:55:00 -0400
发现主动脉瓣和主动脉根之间的数学关系宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。该研究旨在通过基于 CTA 成像的重建研究主动脉瓣和主动脉根部之间的数学关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Mathematical-relationship- Between-aortic-valve-and-aortic-root-discovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Mathematical-relationship- Between-aortic-valve-and-aortic-root-discovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0511c07a-2c0f-4421-bf34-e2658ef3f59a Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:51:00 -0400
冠心病合并高血压患者自主神经系统功能障碍更为严重宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。这项观察性研究的目的是对 60 岁以上患有冠状动脉疾病、血压正常或高血压的患者的自主神经系统功能进行深入分析。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Autonomic-nervous-system-dysfunction-more-severe-in-病人-with-CHD-and-hypertension.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Autonomic-nervous-system-dysfunction-more-severe-in-病人-with-CHD-and-hypertension.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ce40278a-c1d0-484e-9187-09583d316be9 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:46:00 -0400 Autonomic nervous system dysfunction more severe in patients with CHD and hypertension
研究：支持性护理需求未得到满足的癌症患者更有可能经历更糟糕的结果迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的最新研究表明，支持性护理需求未得到满足的癌症患者更有可能经历更糟糕的临床结果，包括更多的急诊科就诊和住院治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Study-Cancer-病人-with-unmet-supportive-care-needs-more-likely-to-experience-worse-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Study-Cancer-病人-with-unmet-supportive-care-needs-more-likely-to-experience-worse-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60bbcc58-9598-49d0-b74e-a50d7f62eba8 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:44:47 -0400 Study: Cancer patients with unmet supportive care needs more likely to experience worse outcomes
牛奶是重要营养素的主要来源，但需要对环境进行权衡与全球所有行业一样，乳制品行业正在努力减少对环境的影响，展望 2050 年共同实现净零排放的未来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Dairy-milk-is-a-key-source-of-important- Nutritions-but-has-environmental-trade-offs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230626/Dairy-milk-is-a-key-source-of-important- Nutritions-but-has-environmental-trade-offs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ee7d2f4-fce0-426f-8ee4-7808baa787d8 Mon, 26 Jun 2023 22:42:20 -0400 Dairy milk is a key source of important nutrients, but has environmental trade-offs
